---
title: "Reading data into R with `readxl`"
author: "Abdul Rahman Shahab"
date: "9/29/2021"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
# Attach the tidyverse, readxl, writexl and here packages:
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(writexl)
library(here)
```


```{r}
fish_counts <- read_csv(here("data", "fish_counts_curated.csv"))
```

```{r}
library(readxl)
substrate_cover <- read_excel("data/substrate_cover_curated.xlsx", 
    na = "-9999", skip = 4)
View(substrate_cover)
```

```{r}
library(readxl)
lobster_data <- read_excel(here("data", "lobsters.xlsx"))
lobster_data
```
